content: Welcome to the Connectathon! Please use this for all PCT Connectathons.
Hi @Larry Decelles @Gary Gryan - Is there an Organization on Touchstone that we can join so that we can run the tests? After a few tests, we get "max test limit exceeded" error.

Hello Tolga,

Yes, you can request to join the Da Vinci organization.

Regards,
Larry

Larry Decelles said:

Hello Tolga,

Yes, you can request to join the Da Vinci organization.

Regards,
Larry

Thank you!
